room_title: Escape room "Cuban Crisis" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: team building exercise with colleagues and it was the first time doing an escape room for most of us. We had such a great time. The lady administering the room and keeping an eye on us recognized when we were really struggling and provided clues when she knew we were at a loss. We managed the escape the room and I can't wait to go back and try some of the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Cuban Crisis" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: Went today for the first time.  Food was better than expected, ambience is great.  We did the Cuban Crisis and while I'd like it to be a bit more difficult, some of the puzzles were tricky.  I'll definitely be back to try a tougher room.

room_title: Escape room "Cuban Crisis" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: For our holiday party, we wanted something unique and Escapology fit the bill. 8 of us went through the Cuban Missile Crisis and had a great time - escaped with time to spare. Lunch afterwards was tasty and fun. Good variety of food choices.
